subject: Which lexical set is the second vowel of _because_ in?
msgSnippet: Is the second syllable vowel of _because_ in the THOUGHT set? In Longman s Pronunciation Dictionary for RP it is listed as either /Q/ or /@/, and for GA it
messageBody:
Is the second syllable vowel of _because_ in the THOUGHT set?
In "Longman's Pronunciation Dictionary" for RP it is listed as either
/Q/ or /@/, and for GA it is /A:/, /Q:/, /V/ or /@/.
I'm guessing it is a THOUGHT member even though the RP in Longman's
doesn't have an /O/ alternative which is the most common (normally
only) one for THOUGHT words in RP.
